title: Snowe Home Is Giving Daily Beast Readers an Exclusive $30 Off Discount
text:
There’s really nothing like snuggling into bed after a long day when it’s just a little chilly outside. You’d best make sure you have a comforter that swallows you up, though. Snowe Home makes some exceptional comforters (and other amazing home goods like this really sweet robe I’ve been eyeing) and right now, Daily Beast readers are getting an exclusive $30 off their first $150+ purchase from Snowe.

Use the code BEAST30 and checkout and get all your hygge home furnishings in one place. Take the classic Down Comforter, for instance. Snowe’s version is made from OEKO-TEX certified cotton and premium French Down from an ethically-sourced manufacturer. Choose between Lightweight, which is great for those who sleep warm, or the All-Season that packs 40% more down for that added weight and warmth. Add a throw blanket on top to complete your cozy bedroom, like the Edge Stripe Throw, made from 100% lambswool and crafted in a heritage Italian mill. Anything you get from Snowe will be your go-to for feeling comfy and content. | Shop at Snowe >
